title: The Naughty Box
description: Come pop this cherry as you dive into a whole world of erotic tales from some of the HOTTEST writers in the romance and erotic publishing world today. “The Naughty Box” is packed full of every toy you can imagine. It is filled with 9 books that will thrill you, set your senses on fire and have you begging for a nice cool drink. So kick back, grab some ice and enjoy the ride. Almost 1700 pages of HOT, HOT, HOT.Included in "The Naughty Box" is: Rue Volley's "Hunter's Blood" SeriesRiley Steel's "Nila Believes"Piper Kay's "A Perfect Passion (The Passion #1)"Chelle's "The Black Lily Club"Nicolette Grey's "The Goddess of Blackwater Pond"Candi Delshamagus's "Taste Eternity"Kim Carmichael's "Trifecta"And a bonus short from Nikki Prince "Slow Burn".
author: Nicolette Grey
